Title: Exempts certain accounts established by not-for-profit corporations from application to the satisfaction of money judgments for bankruptcy purposes
Summary: Exempts retirement accounts established by not-for-profit corporations from application to the satisfaction of money judgments for bankruptcy purposes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to exempting certain accounts established by not-for-profit corporations from application to the satisfaction of money judgments for bankruptcy purposes
